general.title: PASSION WORKS STUDIO
general.return_description: of social, environmental, and economic impact
general.subtitle: Social Return on Investment Impact Calculator created by
general.description: Social Return on Investment (SROI) is a method of calculating and communicating impact using dollar values. SROI measures the social value created by an organization’s activities, products, services or community initiatives. SROI combines social, economic, and environmental impacts into a comprehensive financial measurement of social value in a holistic measure of impact.

tables.title: What economic impact is created?
tables.tooltip: Economic impact includes changes to individual or collective financial assets including profit, savings, currency circulation, and built capital.

tables.title: What social impact is created?
tables.tooltip: Social impact includes changes to individuals, groups of people, and organizations in areas such as health, well-being, safety, relationship, and belonging.
